short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps Mahjong players spot their less optimal moves

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extend the Mahjong-AI reviewer to spot your less optimal moves.

How to use:

1. Visit https://mjai.ekyu.moe/
2. Submit your game logs such as https://game.mahjongsoul.com/?paipu=211222-4ff0b052-57b5-457f-b2ee-3e1ca4866225
3. This extension automatically annotates your less optimal moves based on the Mortal's score where `πτ​(a∣s)×100 < 5.0`
